title: Google Developer Group - General Director
description: Leading a community of 500+ developers, organizing events, workshops, and hackathons to promote technology and innovation.

title: Hackathon Winner - TechFest 2024
description: First place in the national level hackathon with a team of 4 members. Built an AI-powered solution for smart city management.

title: Open Source Contributor
description: Contributed to 15+ open source projects on GitHub with over 500 commits. Maintained projects with 1000+ stars.

title: Community Event Organizer
description: Successfully organized 25+ tech events including bootcamps, workshops, and seminars with 500+ total participants.

title: Technical Speaker
description: Delivered talks on modern web development and cloud technologies at various conferences and meetups.

title: Mentor & Trainer
description: Mentored 50+ students in web development and helped them secure internships and full-time positions.
